Ashish Kadam wrote:

> Hey Guys
> Does anyone know of a better tool for testing
> webservice or even if it is possible to do tat using
> junit or cactus?

It is possible to test anything with a Java interface using JUnit.

As for a "better tool," can you tell us what you don't like about 
testing web services with JUnit? Are you testing a web service provider 
or client? What problems have you encountered so far?
